archimate:BusinessProcess.name: SWE.5.BP7 Establish bidirectional traceability
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Establish bidirectional traceability between elements of the software architectural design and test cases included in the software integration test specification. Establish bidirectional traceability between test cases included in the software integration test specification and software integration test results. NOTE 6: Bidirectional traceability supports coverage, consistency and impact analysis.
